IDENTITY.TITLE: What is the meaning of GAMA?
IDENTITY.PARAGRAPH: we are a group of people who share a series of concerns surrounding the gospel and the Church of Christ. We believe that God is awakening and commissioning His Church throughout the earth to fulfill its calling and achieve the destiny God has for it

VISION.TITLE: VISION
VISION.PARAGRAPH: Be part of the awakening that God has for His Church.

MISSION.TITLE: MISSION
MISSION.PARAGRAPH: Through different evangelism and mission initiatives we want to spread the awakening of the Church of Christ.

VALUES.TITLE: VALUES
VALUES.PARAGRAPH: We identify God's Word fully in the Bible and trust in the Holy Spirit as our guide.
